error_descriptions.1: Under-voltage - Battery voltage is too low. Recharge the battery or check connections
error_descriptions.2: Over-voltage - Voltage is too high. Ensure 12V/24V input matches the heater setting
error_descriptions.3: Glow Plug Fault - Glow plug is faulty or unplugged. Check plug and wiring
error_descriptions.4: Fuel Pump Fault - Fuel pump is disconnected or broken. Check wire connection
error_descriptions.5: Overheating - Unit is too hot. Check that air intake/outlets are not blocked and vents are open
error_descriptions.6: Fan Motor Fault - Fan motor issue or low voltage preventing motor start
error_descriptions.7: Controller/Heater Fault - Communication breakdown between the controller and motherboard
